data.text: @TregaskesW @cynonvalleymus Well done Will. It's been brilliant getting to know you through the Digital Questions project and seeing the great work that you've been doing.

@charmorgan_ @cynonvalleymus Yes it definitely does! But fantastic to see them delivered 😁

Hard to believe by the end of March I will have spent longer at CVM with COVID then without!
@TregaskesW @cynonvalleymus Congrats Will, really pleased to see these projects come to fruition (feels like aeons since their inception!) & the museum get back on the road to sustainability 💪🏼

This wouldn't have been possible with everyone @cynonvalleymus working together to move the museum forward. 

There is a lot more work to do over the next six months as we work to take the next steps to secure our future and vision at the centre of our communities.

- Put in place a new 5 year business plan and create a vision for the museum's future

- Work to re-establish our visitor base working in partnership to do more for more people. Most recently we have run programming for #HMD2022 and #LGBTplusHM and Winter of Wellness...

Over the last year the CVMT team has

- Implemented a capital project to make the museum toilets more accessible and gender neutral
- Created a ground floor accessible office
-Reopened the museum following almost 15 months of total closure due to #COVID19 
...
